0.1.name: wordpress/wp-sentence
0.1.description:
WP Sentence is a wordpress plugin that allows you to add new widget to Your sidebar. WP Sentence shows one of the 470 citations. When the page refreshes widget show different (random) quote.

List of all quotes:

WP Sentence - Quotes List

Demo :

You can see a demo on my website : Jakubas.net.pl

"Life is like riding a bicycle - in order to keep your balance, you must keep moving. - Albert Einstein"
